name: A Typical Game of Dungeons and Dragons
name_original: A Typical Game of Dungeons and Dragons
description: As a video game fan and a Dungeons and Dragons nerd, I wanted to combine my two passions, and produced this game. It's a very simple game set in your average medieval fantasy setting, where the player can choose different actions throughout and role play as the amnesiac protagonist stuck in a normal shop with a normal(?) shopkeeper. By no means is this a serious game, but I hope you enjoy it!
